summary: DRIVING, PARKED, STARTING, AND ON ITS OWN SITTING IN GARAGE. THE ELECTRICAL SYSTEM GOES CRAZY INTERMITENTLY.  HORN, WIPERS (FRONT AND REAR), DOOR LOCKS, AND WIPER FLUID ENGAGE.    WHILE DRIVING THE POWER STEERING AND BRAKES FAIL.   VERY DANGEROUS PROBLEM AND NEEDS ATTENTION WITH THE AMOUNT OF COMPLAINTS I AM SEEING ON THE INTERNET ON FORUMS FOR THIS MODEL OF VAN.
